r.d: Interface to eBay's XML-API. It provides objects that are able to communicate with eBay as well as models that help you working with the return values like User or Item models. The Services_Ebay class provides a unified method to use all objects.
r.n: Services_Ebay now always encodes data in UTF-8, as requested by the eBay webservice. You can still use ISO-8859-1 encoding in your scripts as all encoding and decoding is done automatically. If you like to switch off this feature, you can tell the session-object that your data already is UTF-8 encoded and that you want UTF-8 encoded data in return. - Added new getErrors() method to Services_Ebay session which will return an array of Services_Ebay_Error objects containing information about all warnings and serious errors (schst) - fixed bug #4181: Only serious errors will be thrown as exceptions (schst) - fixed bug #4296: UTF-8 encoding (schst) - fixed bug #4326: wrong variable name (schst) - fixed bug #4420: wrong capitalization in example (amt)
